alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Greene; Polk; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 11:25PM CDT until July 31 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Dallas County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Polk County in southwestern Missouri... Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Buffalo to near Fair Grove to near Nixa, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Republic, Marshfield, Battlefield, Willard, Rogersville, Strafford, Seymour, Fair Grove, Fordland, Conway, Pleasant Hope, Niangua, Brookline, Diggins, Elkland, Glidewell, Turners, March and Rader. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 69 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
